mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.huanjingbaohufa_name as huanjingbaohufaName ,a.huanjingbaohufa_types as huanjingbaohufaTypes ,a.huanjingbaohufa_photo as huanjingbaohufaPhoto ,a.huanjingbaohufa_content as huanjingbaohufaContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM huanjingbaohufa a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.huanjingbaohufa_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanjingbaohufaName},'%')
and a.huanjingbaohufa_types = #{params.huanjingbaohufaTypes}
and a.huanjingbaohufa_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanjingbaohufaContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
